title: Download: MIUI Closed Beta for Xiaomi and Redmi devices [Update: April 7 PRE builds]
content:
The latest version of Xiaomi’s custom Android skin – MIUI 12.5 – is finally here. The first incremental update over MIUI 12 has been unveiled at the Mi 11 launch event in China. Compared to MIUI 12, the stable version of which was released less than six months ago, MIUI 12.5 brings in a slew

The post Download: MIUI Closed Beta for Xiaomi and Redmi devices [Update: April 7 PRE builds] appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Xiaomi has publicly announced MIUI 12, the latest version of their custom Android skin. If you're interested in trying out, closed betas are now available!
